channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Indian Voters Are Being Bombarded With Millions of Deepfakes. Political Candidates Approve
item.description: India’s elections are a glimpse of the AI-driven future of democracy. Politicians are using audio and video deepfakes of themselves to reach voters—wh...

item.title: OpenseedVC, which backs operators in Africa and Europe starting their companies, reaches first close of $10M fund
item.description: Founder-market fit is one of the most crucial factors in a startup’s success, and operators (someone involved in the day-to-day operations of a startu...

item.title: The 18 Best PlayStation Plus Games (May 2024)
item.description: What should you play next on your PS5 or PS4? From Fallout 4 to Ghost of Tsushima, Sony’s subscription service has a ton of great video games.

item.title: Pine Labs gets Singapore court approval to shift base to India
item.description: A Singapore High Court has effectively approved Pine Labs' request to shift its operations to India. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For perso...

item.title: 14 Best Sunglasses for Everyday (2025): Meta Ray-Ban, JINS, and more
item.description: Protect your eyes in style while you lounge, run, paddle, or work on your computer outside.

item.title: UK opens office in San Francisco to tackle AI risk
item.description: The AI Safety Institute, a U.K. body that aims to assess and address risks in AI platforms, has said it will open a second location in San Francisco. ...

item.title: Valoi Easy35 Film-Scanning Kit Review: Fast, Affordable, and Easy to Use
item.description: If you need an easy, cheap, fast way to scan your 35-mm film, Valoi’s Easy35 is, er, the easiest way we’ve found to digitize images.

item.title: Why companies are turning to internal hackathons
item.description: Companies are always looking for an edge, and searching for ways to encourage their employees to innovate. One way to do that is by running an interna...

item.title: 13 Best Office Chairs (2024): Budget, Luxe, Cushions, Casters, and Mats
item.description: Sitting at a desk for hours? Upgrade your WFH setup and work in style with these comfy WIRED-tested seats.

item.title: I’m rooting for Melinda French Gates to fix tech’s broken ‘brilliant jerk’ culture
item.description: Women in tech still face a shocking level of mistreatment at work. Melinda French Gates is one of the few working to change that. © 2024 TechCrunch. A...
